sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-table
            :data="page"
            border
            style="width: 100%"
            :default-sort = "{prop: 'time', order: 'descending'}"
            >
        <el-table-column
            prop="name"
            label="用户名"
        >
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
            prop="account"
            label="工号">
        </el-table-column>
        
        <el-table-column
            prop="time"
            label="打卡时间"
            sortable
            :formatter="formatDate"
            >
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column
            prop="type"
            label="打卡类型"
            :formatter="formatType"
            >
        </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    setup() {
        this.data = {
            page: []
        }
    },
    created() {
        this.loaddata();
    },
    methods: {
        loaddata() {
            var account = window.sessionStorage.getItem('account');
            this.$http.get('/queryAllRecords').then(res => {
                console.log(res.data);
                this.page = res.data;
            });
        },
        formatType(row) {
            if (row.type == 0) {
                return '上班打卡';
            } else if (row.type == 1) {
                return '下班打卡';
            } else if (row.type == 2) {
                return '外出打卡';
            } else if (row.type == 3) {
                return '返回打卡';
            }
        },
        formatDate(row) {
            var date = new Date(row.time);
            var Y = date.getFullYear() + '-';
            var M = (date.getMonth() + 1 < 10 ? '0' + (date.getMonth() + 1) : date.getMonth() + 1) + '-';
            var D = date.getDate() + ' ';
            var h = date.getHours() + ':';
            var m = date.getMinutes() + ':';
            var s = date.getSeconds();
            return Y + M + D + h + m + s;
        }
    }
}
</script>
